A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best part of The Last Jedi is Mark Hamill's performance. While it's enjoyable as a stand-alone cash grab featuring great acting and some fun sequences\, The Last Jedi was very poorly written\, including no character development\, several plot holes\, and pointless sub-plots\, making this film the worst in the series and puts Episode 9 in a tough position to deliver a satisfying conclusion to the sequel trilogy as well as the saga.
